definition: unswerving in one's loyalty (idiom); faithful and constant
loyal/devoted/honest
chaste
(negative prefix)/not/no
short name for Chongqing 重慶|重庆[Chong2 qing4]/old name of Jialing river 嘉陵江[Jia1 ling2 jiang1] in Sichuan

sentences.english: She did not remain anything like faithful to him.
sentences.chinese: 她後來對他就根本談不上什麼忠貞不渝了。

sentences.english: Her husband was charged with fraud but she stuck by him.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫被指控犯有詐騙罪，但她仍舊對他忠貞不渝。

sentences.english: She's always faithful to her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她對丈夫始終忠貞不渝。

sentences.english: All the men that are constantly drooling.
sentences.chinese: 所有的男人都是忠貞不渝。

sentences.english: I see. And I'll always be devoted to you.
sentences.chinese: 我明白，我將對你忠貞不渝。

sentences.english: Her pledge to remain faithful to him was his anchor when he was in prison.
sentences.chinese: 她對他忠貞不渝的保證是他服刑時代的精神支柱。
他是一個忠貞不渝的愛人。

sentences.english: Being faithful to one's spouse is a duty.
sentences.chinese: 對配偶忠貞不渝是一項義務。

sentences.english: He pledged in all sincerity and seriousness that he would always remain faithful.
sentences.chinese: 他信誓旦旦地保證，他將永遠忠貞不渝。

definition: cheerful/happy
loath to part (idiom); emotionally close and unwilling to separate
to show off one's ability
carcass/naked body
to show every possible consideration (idiom); meticulous care
devotion to righteousness that inspires reverence (idiom)
see 眾星捧月|众星捧月[zhong4 xing1 peng3 yue4]
(of friends or partners) to share both the honor and the disgrace (idiom)
lit. to lift the tray to eyebrow level (idiom); mutual respect in a marriage
proud and arrogant
lit. one body two sides (idiom)/fig. a situation with two sides to it
Tibetan prayer flag
the shrike and the swallow fly in different directions (idiom)/(usually of a couple) to part from each other
to make a significant advance in one's career (idiom)/to get one's big break
chicken-hearted (idiom)/gutless
true sentiments are seen in hard times (idiom)/you see who your true friends are when you go through tough times together/you see who your true friends are when you are in difficulties
